summary: Completed comprehensive end-to-end testing of cafe bill generator app. All backend APIs and frontend features working perfectly.

design_issues.issue: Minor warning: Missing 'Description' or 'aria-describedby' for DialogContent components in menu management

passed_tests: GET /api/menu returns 20 pre-populated menu items with all categories
POST /api/menu creates new menu item successfully
PUT /api/menu/{id} updates menu item correctly
DELETE /api/menu/{id} deletes menu item successfully
POST /api/bills generates bill with correct tax/discount calculations
GET /api/bills retrieves all bills
Dashboard page loads with all menu items displayed correctly
Category filtering works for all categories (All, Coffee, Tea, Pastries, Snacks, Beverages)
Add items to order functionality working
Quantity increase/decrease in order working
Remove items from order working
Clear order button clears all items
Discount percentage input affects total calculation correctly
Tax percentage input affects total calculation correctly
Generate Bill button creates bill and shows bill number
Print and Download buttons appear after successful bill generation
Menu Management page loads with all items in table format
Add new menu item via dialog works correctly
Toggle item availability works
Navigation between Dashboard and Menu Management works seamlessly
Complete end-to-end workflow from adding items to generating bill works perfectly
success_percentage: Backend: 100% (9/9 tests passed), Frontend: 100% (13/13 major features tested)
